analysis.key_quote: Stop messing with what actually makes this country great. Leave people's livelihoods alone. Leave their ability to do actual good, important, necessary work alone.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of nonpartisan civil service work and the dangers of politicizing government roles. It highlights the value of a merit-based system and the need to protect the livelihoods of those dedicated to public service.
